section:
If you are an initiate of Lacuna then you have the option to visit the nearby abbey of your goddess.
Non-initiates cannot usually find the path to the abbey, as it is hidden and protected by powerful spells, though you can attempt to uncover it by
making a MAGIC roll at Difficulty 15 or
a SCOUTING roll at Difficulty 18 .
Initiate of Lacuna Find the path using MAGIC or SCOUTING Failed roll, or not searching for the abbey
